term.title: Chemically Induced Dynamic Nuclear Polarization

item.text: Non-Boltzmann nuclear spin state distribution produced in thermal or photochemical reactions, usually from colligation and diffusion, or disproportionation of radical pairs, and detected by NMRspectroscopy by enhanced absorption or emission signals.
